node.comment: Enable robust ingest of YouTube/Vimeo/audio URLs with fallbacks, progress UI, and auto language detection.

node.title: Scope
node.comment: - Support YouTube, Vimeo, direct MP3/MP4 links. - Use yt-dlp with cookies.json optional support; fallback to server fetch for protected content. - Auto-detect language using short sample; choose model accordingly.

node.title: UX
node.comment: - Paste URL in Home screen field. - Show validation, resolving, download progress, duration estimate. - Clear errors with remediation tips.

node.title: Acceptance Criteria
node.comment: - 90%+ of common YouTube URLs succeed end-to-end. - Graceful error for geo/age restrictions with fallback instructions. - Auto language detection selects correct model.
